name: H.E.R.O
description:
Helicopter Emergency Rescue Operations (H.E.R.O.)

A group of miners were trapped below the surface of the Earth.

Can you -- our amazing HERO -- come to their rescue and save them?

Use your skills as you visit the depths of the caves to find the lost miners.

Fly your Helicopter backpack through the dangerous caves filled with bats, snakes and spiders!

Shoot the critters to get rid of them!

Drop dynamite next to brick or lava walls to destroy them!

Do not touch the critters or thick lava walls and never, ever stand on the dynamite when it blows up!

Keys to use:

Q = Fly Up

A = Drop dynamite

N = Fly Left

M = Fly Right

Space = shoot laser

It's up to you, our intrepid HERO, to save all of the miners from a terrible fate!
